text: Share 190 shares He looked relaxed as he was commended for his work, with Hacksaw Ridge starring the likes of Andrew Garfield, Sam Worthington, Teresa Palmer and Rachel Griffiths. According to The Hollywood Reporter , Rocky Balboa star Sylvester praised his pal, Mel. Taking it all in: He looked relaxed as he was commended for his work, with Hacksaw Ridge starring the likes of Andrew Garfield, Sam Worthington, Teresa Palmer and Rachel Griffiths Accolade: The 61-year-old star was presented his award on stage by fellow Hollywood heavyweight Sylvester Stallone, 70 In the limelight: Mel looked smart at the event - which was held in Hollywood - wearing a black suit with a matching black shirt 'He's gifted': According to The Hollywood Reporter, Rocky Balboa star Sylvester praised his pal, Mel 'It's comes as no great surprise he's always going to be at the forefront of this industry,' Sylvester said. He added: 'He's gifted.' According to the publication, Mel then presented Sylvester with an award, the Jack Valenti lifetime achievement award. Hacksaw Ridge has helped Gibson enjoy a career renaissance after he was the focus of multiple high profile scandals. According to Deadline , Mel is in talks with Warner Bros to direct the sequel to Suicide Squad. Pals: According to The Hollywood Reporter, Mel then presented Sylvester with an award, the Jack Valenti lifetime achievement award Back on track: Hacksaw Ridge has helped Gibson enjoy a career renaissance after he was the focus of multiple high profile scandals Rumours: According to Deadline, Mel is in talks with Warner Bros to direct the sequel to Suicide Squad Doing well: Hacksaw Ridge was also nominated for two Golden Globe Awards, best picture-drama and best-director Hacksaw Ridge is up for six Oscar Awards, with the ceremony taking place in the US later this month. Mel has been given a nod for best director, which he last won in 1996 for his film, Braveheart. Hacksaw Ridge was also nominated for two Golden Globe Awards, best picture-drama and best-director.
